name: File.webkitRelativePath
description: The File.webkitRelativePath is a read-only property that contains a USVString which specifies the file's path relative to the directory selected by the user in an input element with its webkitdirectory attribute set.

refs.name: File and Directory Entries API
refs.description: The definition of 'webkitRelativePath' in the 'File and Directory Entries API' specification.
